about_the_game:
Loot, Kill, Surrive.

Welcome to Free Royale. A brand new Free To Play Battle Royale Experiance where the community is in control of the action! Is there something that you always wanted to use? A fish as a melee weapon? Jetpack's that shoot glitter? No clip for a few seconds as a powerup?

Well none of these are (currently) in the game but they could be! This is the game where the community decides what should be in! With custom lobbies, public games and more exciting features to come such as making your own battle royale map that could end up becoming an official map!

Take part in an ever expanding world with new modes, maps, features and even whole graphical redesgins!

Forever Free 2 Play with no monetry actions that would provide a competive advantage ever.

This is only the beginning...

ext_user_account_notice: ECZilla Games Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Processor Extreme Edition 965/ AMD Athlon.
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon M470X/ Nvidia Kepler
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This information is subject to change
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 3950X/ Intel Core i9-10980XE Extreme Edition
  • Memory: 55000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2080 Ti/ AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 66 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound ZxR
  • Additional Notes: This information is subject to change

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: TBC
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any intergrated with approx 512mb of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This information is subject to change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: TBC
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or Similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This information is subject to change
